pages.text: This is the trail map. It's the only item added by the Trails mod. It is essential to create your trails around the world.

pages.title: How to craft it
pages.text: It is crafted as shown. $(br2) The trail map is also dyeable, and it is highly recommended that you name it in an anvil.

pages.title: How to use the Trail map
pages.text: There are 3 steps to creating your trails: $(br2) - Build Trail Beacons along your path $(br2) - Click on all of them  with the Trail map. If you hear a drawing sound, the beacon has been registered. $(br) NOTE: You need to right click on the bottom most center block of a beacon. $(br2) - Merge your trail map with some regular maps in a cartography table to map your trails
